alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 3:36PM CDT until May 09 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 336 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rush Center, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ash Valley around 355 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Larned. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
